item.title: Fridge freezer dumped on road, 8th July
item.description:

item.title: Bus stop not visible to bus drivers, 8th July
item.description:
This bus stop is covered by branches and leaves from property itâ€™s outside of. Bus drivers therefore keep missing the stop resulting in people having to walk a long way uphill from the next stop which is hard for those with mobility issues. It needs clearing
